mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_users( username, password, email, nickname, role ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{role} )
mapper.select: CREATE TABLE tbl_users ( username VARCHAR2(20) PRIMARY KEY, password nVARCHAR2(125) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR2(125) NOT NULL UNIQUE, name nVARCHAR2(125), nickname nVARCHAR2(125), role VARCHAR2(5) )
